description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Zombie Monkeys takes your classic tower defense game into the heart of the jungle. Maya Zombies have risen from the grave and the desire for monkey brains has them on the move. Defend your temple with single target blow gun towers, splash damage coconut towers, slowing banana towers, dazing pineapple towers and more.  Do you have what it takes to defend your temple from brain sucking zombies?
